Package tech.hiddenproject.progressive.annotation

Annotation Type GameBean

  • @Target({TYPE,METHOD,ANNOTATION_TYPE})
@Retention(RUNTIME)
@Documented
public @interface GameBean
    Marks class or method as bean provider for Dependency Injection container.

    policy - defines if bean should be recreated before DIContainer.getBean(String, Class)

    name - specifies bean name. If not specified, then bean will get method or class name in lower case

    order - specifies order in which annotated methods will be executed in Configuration

    variant - specifies variant this bean will be used in. Only beans with variant, which equals to variant specified in BasicDIContainer will be loaded. You can create beans for different use cases, build platforms, etc.

    Bean creation strategy from methods:

    Sort methods by parameters count, then sorts them by order(), then invokes methods in sorted order

    Bean creation strategy from classes:

    Creates meta information of bean. Then creates object from bean class. If class has constructor annotated as Autofill, then inject beans as constructor parameters and creates object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Fields Description
      static String DEFAULT_VARIANT
      Used by default in DI Container.
      static String GLOBAL_VARIANT
      Used for global beans.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      String name  
      int order  
      GameBeanCreationPolicy policy  
      String variant  

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_VARIANT

        static final String DEFAULT_VARIANT
        Used by default in DI Container.

      • GLOBAL_VARIANT

        static final String GLOBAL_VARIANT
        Used for global beans. Default variant for bean.

    • Element Detail

      • policy

        GameBeanCreationPolicy policy
        Default:
        tech.hiddenproject.progressive.injection.GameBeanCreationPolicy.SINGLETON

      • name

        String name
        Default:
        ""

      • order

        int order
        Default:
        0

      • variant

        String variant
        Default:
        "_GLOBAL"
